ig-88-ig-2000.author: Atomic Mass Games
ig-88-ig-2000.name: IG-2000
ig-88-ig-2000.ability: You ignore the escort and counter keywords on enemy squadrons.

ig-88b-ig-2000b.author: Atomic Mass Games
ig-88b-ig-2000b.name: IG-2000B
ig-88b-ig-2000b.ability: At the start of the Squadron Phase, you may toggle your activation slider to the activated side. If you do, you may perform an anti-squadron attack against each enemy squadron at distance 1. Treat these attacks as obstructed.

boba-fett-slave-i.author: Atomic Mass Games
boba-fett-slave-i.name: Slave I
boba-fett-slave-i.ability: When you activate, choose 1 enemy ship or squadron at distance 1. That ship or squadron suffers 1 damage.

hondo-ohnaka-slave-i.author: Fantasy Flight Games
hondo-ohnaka-slave-i.release: Rebellion in the Rim Campaign Armada
hondo-ohnaka-slave-i.expansion: Rebellion in the Rim - Campaign Expansion (SWM31)
hondo-ohnaka-slave-i.name: Slave I
hondo-ohnaka-slave-i.ability: During your activation, instead of attacking, you may toggle the activation slider of 1 squadron at distance 1 to the activated side. If it was already activated, you may place it anywhere at distance 1 of you.

dengar-punishing-one.author: Fantasy Flight Games
dengar-punishing-one.name: Punishing One
dengar-punishing-one.ability: While another friendly squadron is at distance 1-2, it has COUNTER 1 or increases its COUNTER value by 1.

tel-trevura-jumpmaster-5000.author: Fantasy Flight Games
tel-trevura-jumpmaster-5000.release: Rebellion in the Rim Campaign Armada
tel-trevura-jumpmaster-5000.expansion: Rebellion in the Rim - Campaign Expansion (SWM31)
tel-trevura-jumpmaster-5000.name: JumpMaster 5000
tel-trevura-jumpmaster-5000.ability:
While you have a readied defense token, you gain ESCORT.
After defending against an attack, if you discarded a defense token, you may recover up to 3 hull (even if you would be destroyed).

lambda-class-shuttle.author: Fantasy Flight Games
lambda-class-shuttle.expansion: Imperial Fighter Squadrons II Expansion Pack (SWM24)
lambda-class-shuttle.name: Lambda-class Shuttle

colonel-jendon-lambda-class-shuttle.author: Atomic Mass Games
colonel-jendon-lambda-class-shuttle.name: Lambda-class Shuttle
colonel-jendon-lambda-class-shuttle.ability: During your activation, instead of attacking, you may choose 1 friendly squadron at distance 1-2. That squadron may perform an attack (even if it has already activated).

gar-saxon-mandalorian-gauntlet-fighter.author: Atomic Mass Games
gar-saxon-mandalorian-gauntlet-fighter.name: Mandalorian Gauntlet Fighter
gar-saxon-mandalorian-gauntlet-fighter.ability: When an enemy squadron with INTEL or RELAY at distance 1 activates, it suffers 1 damage.

fenn-rau-mandalorian-gauntlet-fighter.author: Atomic Mass Games
fenn-rau-mandalorian-gauntlet-fighter.name: Mandalorian Gauntlet Fighter
fenn-rau-mandalorian-gauntlet-fighter.ability: When you are chosen to activate by a Squadron command, after the activation is resolved, choose up to 2 non-unique squadrons at Distance 1. The chosen squads may activate as if they were chosen by the Squadron command.

darth-vader-tie-advanced-squadron.author: Fantasy Flight Games
darth-vader-tie-advanced-squadron.name: TIE Advanced Squadron
darth-vader-tie-advanced-squadron.ability: While attacking, each of your :crit: icons adds 1 damage to the damage total.

zertik-strom-tie-advanced-squadron.author: Fantasy Flight Games
zertik-strom-tie-advanced-squadron.name: TIE Advanced Squadron
zertik-strom-tie-advanced-squadron.ability: While attacking, you may choose another friendly squadron at distance 1. If you do, that squadron suffers 1 damage and you may reroll any number of attack dice

major-rhymer-tie-bomber-squadron.author: Fantasy Flight Games
major-rhymer-tie-bomber-squadron.name: TIE Bomber Squadron
major-rhymer-tie-bomber-squadron.ability: Friendly squadrons at distance 1 can attack enemy ships at close range using all dice in their battery armament.

captain-jonus-tie-bomber-squadron.author: Fantasy Flight Games
captain-jonus-tie-bomber-squadron.name: TIE Bomber Squadron
captain-jonus-tie-bomber-squadron.ability: While a friendly ship is attacking a ship at distance 1 of you, it may change 1 die to a face with an :accuracy: icon.

tie-defender-squadron.author: Fantasy Flight Games
tie-defender-squadron.expansion: Imperial Fighter Squadrons II Expansion Pack (SWM24)
tie-defender-squadron.name: TIE Defender Squadron

maarek-stele-tie-defender-squadron.author: Fantasy Flight Games
maarek-stele-tie-defender-squadron.expansion: Imperial Fighter Squadrons II Expansion Pack (SWM24)
maarek-stele-tie-defender-squadron.name: TIE Defender Squadron
maarek-stele-tie-defender-squadron.ability: While attacking, you may change 1 die to a face with a :crit: icon.

darth-vader-tie-defender-squadron.author: Atomic Mass Games
darth-vader-tie-defender-squadron.name: TIE Defender Squadron
darth-vader-tie-defender-squadron.ability: While attacking a unique squadron, each of your :crit: icons adds 1 damage to the damage total.

howlrunner-tie-fighter-squadron.author: Fantasy Flight Games
howlrunner-tie-fighter-squadron.name: TIE Fighter Squadron
howlrunner-tie-fighter-squadron.ability: While another friendly squadron with SWARM at distance 1 is attacking a squadron, it may add 1 blue die to its attack pool.

mauler-mithel-tie-fighter-squadron.author: Fantasy Flight Games
mauler-mithel-tie-fighter-squadron.name: TIE Fighter Squadron
mauler-mithel-tie-fighter-squadron.ability: After you move, each squadron engaged with you suffers 1 damage.

valen-rudor-tie-fighter-squadron.author: Fantasy Flight Games
valen-rudor-tie-fighter-squadron.name: TIE Fighter Squadron
valen-rudor-tie-fighter-squadron.ability: While an enemy squadron is engaged with another squadron, it cannot attack you.

soontir-fel-tie-interceptor-squadron.author: Fantasy Flight Games
soontir-fel-tie-interceptor-squadron.name: TIE Interceptor Squadron
soontir-fel-tie-interceptor-squadron.ability: After a squadron you are engaged with performs a non-COUNTER attack, it suffers 1 damage if it did not attack you.

ciena-ree-tie-interceptor-squadron.author: Fantasy Flight Games
ciena-ree-tie-interceptor-squadron.name: TIE Interceptor Squadron
ciena-ree-tie-interceptor-squadron.ability: While you are defending, the attack is treated as obstructed.

vult-skerris-tie-interceptor-squadron.author: Atomic Mass Games
vult-skerris-tie-interceptor-squadron.name: TIE Interceptor Squadron
vult-skerris-tie-interceptor-squadron.ability: During the squadron phase, you cannot attack unless you are performing a COUNTER attack.

tie-phantom-squadron.author: Fantasy Flight Games
tie-phantom-squadron.expansion: Imperial Fighter Squadrons II Expansion Pack (SWM24)
tie-phantom-squadron.name: TIE Phantom Squadron

whisper-tie-phantom-squadron.author: Atomic Mass Games
whisper-tie-phantom-squadron.name: TIE Phantom Squadron
whisper-tie-phantom-squadron.ability: After defending against an attack, if you spent a defense token, you may move up to distance 1, even if you are engaged.

vt-49-decimator.author: Fantasy Flight Games
vt-49-decimator.expansion: Imperial Fighter Squadrons II Expansion Pack (SWM24)
vt-49-decimator.name: VT-49 Decimator

morna-kee-vt-49-decimator.author: Fantasy Flight Games
morna-kee-vt-49-decimator.expansion: Imperial Fighter Squadrons II Expansion Pack (SWM24)
morna-kee-vt-49-decimator.name: VT-49 Decimator
morna-kee-vt-49-decimator.ability: While attacking, you may spend 1 defense token to reroll any number of dice in your attack pool. When you activate, you may recover 1 of your discarded defense tokens.

bossk-hounds-tooth.author: Fantasy Flight Games
bossk-hounds-tooth.name: Hound's Tooth
bossk-hounds-tooth.ability: While attacking, if you have 6 or fewer hull points remaining, you may add 1 blue die set to the :accuracy: icon to your attack pool.

moralo-eval-yv-666.author: Fantasy Flight Games
moralo-eval-yv-666.release: Rebellion in the Rim Campaign Armada
moralo-eval-yv-666.expansion: Rebellion in the Rim - Campaign Expansion (SWM31)
moralo-eval-yv-666.name: YV-666
moralo-eval-yv-666.ability: When an objective token at distance 1-2 and not on an obstacle is moved or removed from the play area, you may move up to distance 1 and attack as if you were activated.

tycho-celchu-a-wing-squadron.author: Fantasy Flight Games
tycho-celchu-a-wing-squadron.name: A-wing Squadron
tycho-celchu-a-wing-squadron.ability: You are not prevented from moving or attacking ships while you are engaged.

shara-bey-a-wing-squadron.author: Fantasy Flight Games
shara-bey-a-wing-squadron.name: A-wing Squadron
shara-bey-a-wing-squadron.ability: While performing a counter attack, each :crit: icon adds 1 damage to the damage total.

keyan-farlander-b-wing-squadron.author: Atomic Mass Games
keyan-farlander-b-wing-squadron.name: B-Wing Squadron
keyan-farlander-b-wing-squadron.ability: While attacking a ship, if the defending hull zone has no shields, you may reroll any number of dice in your attack pool.

ten-numb-b-wing-squadron.author: Fantasy Flight Games
ten-numb-b-wing-squadron.name: B-Wing Squadron
ten-numb-b-wing-squadron.ability: While attacking a squadron, you may spend 1 blue die with a :crit: icon. If you do, each other enemy squadron at distance 1 of the defender suffers 1 damage.

corran-horn-e-wing-squadron.author: Fantasy Flight Games
corran-horn-e-wing-squadron.expansion: Rebel Fighter Squadrons II Expansion Pack (SWM23)
corran-horn-e-wing-squadron.name: E-wing Squadron

jan-ors-moldy-crow.author: Fantasy Flight Games
jan-ors-moldy-crow.name: Moldy Crow
jan-ors-moldy-crow.ability: While a friendly squadron at distance 1-2 is defending, it can spend your defense tokens.

kanan-jarrus-hwk-290.author: Fantasy Flight Games
kanan-jarrus-hwk-290.release: Rebellion in the Rim Campaign Armada
kanan-jarrus-hwk-290.expansion: Rebellion in the Rim - Campaign Expansion (SWM31)
kanan-jarrus-hwk-290.name: HWK-290
kanan-jarrus-hwk-290.ability: While attacking a ship, you may spend 1 die with a :crit: icon. If you do, the defender gains 1 raid token of your choice.

ketsu-onyo-lancer-class-pursuit-craft.author: Fantasy Flight Games
ketsu-onyo-lancer-class-pursuit-craft.expansion: Rebel Fighter Squadrons II Expansion Pack (SWM23)
ketsu-onyo-lancer-class-pursuit-craft.name: Shadow Caster
ketsu-onyo-lancer-class-pursuit-craft.ability: While an enemy squadron is at distance 1, its speed is reduced by 2 to a minimum of 1.

nym-havoc.author: Fantasy Flight Games
nym-havoc.name: Havoc
nym-havoc.ability: Blue :crit: : If the defender is a ship, you may choose and discard 1 of its defense tokens.

malee-hurra-scurrg-h-6-bomber.author: Atomic Mass Games
malee-hurra-scurrg-h-6-bomber.name: Scurrg H-6 Bomber
malee-hurra-scurrg-h-6-bomber.ability: Once per activation, while a friendly ship is attacking a ship at distance 1 of you and you are engaged by 1 or fewer squadrons, the attacker may spend 1 die to change 1 die to a face with a :crit: icon.

vcx-100-freighter.author: Fantasy Flight Games
vcx-100-freighter.expansion: Rebel Fighter Squadrons II Expansion Pack (SWM23)
vcx-100-freighter.name: VCX-100 Freighter

hera-syndulla-ghost.author: Fantasy Flight Games
hera-syndulla-ghost.expansion: Rebel Fighter Squadrons II Expansion Pack (SWM23)
hera-syndulla-ghost.name: Ghost
hera-syndulla-ghost.ability: At the start of the Squadron Phase, choose up to 2 friendly squadrons at distance 1-2. Those squadrons gain ROGUE until the end of the round.

luke-skywalker-x-wing-squadron.author: Fantasy Flight Games
luke-skywalker-x-wing-squadron.name: X-wing Squadron
luke-skywalker-x-wing-squadron.ability: When attacking a ship, treat the defender as having no shields.

biggs-darklighter-x-wing-squadron.author: Fantasy Flight Games
biggs-darklighter-x-wing-squadron.name: X-wing Squadron
biggs-darklighter-x-wing-squadron.ability: Before a friendly squadron with ESCORT at distance 1 suffers damage during an attack, you may reduce the total damage by 1. If you do, choose a frienly squadron with ESCORT at distance 1. That squadron suffers 1 damage.

hera-syndulla-x-wing-squadron.author: Atomic Mass Games
hera-syndulla-x-wing-squadron.name: X-wing Squadron
hera-syndulla-x-wing-squadron.ability: While a friendly squadron that has ESCORT is at distnace 1-2, it has ADEPT 1

wedge-antilles-x-wing-squadron.author: Fantasy Flight Games
wedge-antilles-x-wing-squadron.name: X-wing Squadron
wedge-antilles-x-wing-squadron.ability: While attacking an activated squadron, you may add 2 blue dice to your attack pool.

dutch-vander-y-wing-squadron.author: Fantasy Flight Games
dutch-vander-y-wing-squadron.name: Y-Wing Squadron
dutch-vander-y-wing-squadron.ability: When a squadron you attack suffers at least 1 damage, you may toggle its activation slider to the activated side. If it was already activated, it suffers 1 additional damage instead.

norra-wexley-y-wing-squadron.author: Fantasy Flight Games
norra-wexley-y-wing-squadron.name: Y-Wing Squadron
norra-wexley-y-wing-squadron.ability: Friendly squadrons with Bomber at distance 1 gain: ":crit:: The defending hull zone loses 1 shield."

han-solo-millennium-falcon.author: Fantasy Flight Games
han-solo-millennium-falcon.name: Millennium Falcon
han-solo-millennium-falcon.ability: At the start of the Ship Phase, you may activate as if you were activated by a :squadron: command.

lando-calrissian-millennium-falcon.author: Atomic Mass Games
lando-calrissian-millennium-falcon.name: Millennium Falcon
lando-calrissian-millennium-falcon.ability:
While attacking, you may discard a defense token to set 1 die to any face. That die cannot be modified again.
While defending you may spend 1 of your defense tokens to force the attacker to reroll 1 or more dice of your choice.

dash-rendar-outrider.author: Fantasy Flight Games
dash-rendar-outrider.name: Outrider
dash-rendar-outrider.ability: While attacking, you may reroll 1 die for each enemy squadron or enemy ship at distance 1.

mart-mattin-satos-hammer.author: Fantasy Flight Games
mart-mattin-satos-hammer.release: Rebellion in the Rim Campaign Armada
mart-mattin-satos-hammer.expansion: Rebellion in the Rim - Campaign Expansion (SWM31)
mart-mattin-satos-hammer.name: Sato's Hammer
mart-mattin-satos-hammer.ability: At the start of the Squadron Phase, you may toggle your activation slider to the activated side. If you do, you may place 1 proximity mine token at distance 1.

z-95-headhunter-squadron.author: Fantasy Flight Games
z-95-headhunter-squadron.expansion: Rebel Fighter Squadrons II Expansion Pack (SWM23)
z-95-headhunter-squadron.name: Z-95 Headhunter Squadron

lieutenant-blount-z-95-headhunter-squadr.author: Fantasy Flight Games
lieutenant-blount-z-95-headhunter-squadr.expansion: Rebel Fighter Squadrons II Expansion Pack (SWM23)
lieutenant-blount-z-95-headhunter-squadr.name: Z-95 Headhunter Squadron
lieutenant-blount-z-95-headhunter-squadr.ability: While another friendly squadron with swarm at distance 1 is attacking a squadron, it may reroll 1 die (in addition to any dice rerolled from swarm).

oddball-arc-170-starfighter-squadron.author: Atomic Mass Games
oddball-arc-170-starfighter-squadron.name: ARC-170 Starfighter Squadron
oddball-arc-170-starfighter-squadron.ability: While attacking, if you moved during this activation, you may reroll up to 2 dice.

anakin-skywalker-btl-b-y-wing-squadron.author: Atomic Mass Games
anakin-skywalker-btl-b-y-wing-squadron.name: BTL-B Y-wing Squadron
anakin-skywalker-btl-b-y-wing-squadron.ability: During your activation, you may spend 1 defense token to ignore engagement until the end of your activation.

matchstick-btl-b-y-wing-squadron.author: Atomic Mass Games
matchstick-btl-b-y-wing-squadron.name: BTL-B Y-wing Squadron
matchstick-btl-b-y-wing-squadron.ability: When a friendly ship resolves a squadron command, if you are in range to be activated, up to 3 of the squadrons with BOMBER it activates can be at distance 1-3 of you.

ahsoka-tano-delta-7-aethersprite-squadro.author: Fantasy Flight Games
ahsoka-tano-delta-7-aethersprite-squadro.name: Delta-7 Aethersprite Squadron
ahsoka-tano-delta-7-aethersprite-squadro.ability: After you move, you may choose another friendly squadron at distance 1. That squadron performs an attack against an enemy squadron at distance 1 with an anti-squadron armament of 2 blue dice.

kit-fisto-delta-7-aethersprite-squadron.author: Atomic Mass Games
kit-fisto-delta-7-aethersprite-squadron.name: Delta-7 Aethersprite Squadron
kit-fisto-delta-7-aethersprite-squadron.ability: When you spend a defense token, you may discard it. If you do, reduce the total damage by 3 instead of resolving that token's effect.

luminara-unduli-delta-7-aethersprite-squ.author: Fantasy Flight Games
luminara-unduli-delta-7-aethersprite-squ.name: Delta-7 Aethersprite Squadron
luminara-unduli-delta-7-aethersprite-squ.ability: While an enemy squadron at distance 1 is attacking an non-unique, friendly squadron, the attack is treated as obstructed.

plo-koon-delta-7-aethersprite-squadron.author: Fantasy Flight Games
plo-koon-delta-7-aethersprite-squadron.name: Delta-7 Aethersprite Squadron
plo-koon-delta-7-aethersprite-squadron.ability: Non-unique, friendly squadrons without counter at distance 1 gain counter 1.

anakin-skywalker-delta-7-aethersprite-sq.author: Atomic Mass Games
anakin-skywalker-delta-7-aethersprite-sq.name: Delta-7 Aethersprite Squadron
anakin-skywalker-delta-7-aethersprite-sq.ability: While attacking a squadron during your activation, at the end of the Resolve Damage step, you may choose up to 2 enemy squadrons at distance 1 of the defender. If the defender was damaged, the chosen squadrons suffer 1 damage.

axe-v-19-torrent-squadron.author: Fantasy Flight Games
axe-v-19-torrent-squadron.name: V-19 Torrent Squadron
axe-v-19-torrent-squadron.ability: Before another friendly squadron at distance 1 suffers damage during an attack, you may spend 1 defense token to reduce the total damage by 1.

kickback-v-19-torrent-squadron.author: Fantasy Flight Games
kickback-v-19-torrent-squadron.name: V-19 Torrent Squadron
kickback-v-19-torrent-squadron.ability: After you perform an attack, you may move up to distance 1, even if you are engaged.

general-grievous-belbullab-22-squadron.author: Fantasy Flight Games
general-grievous-belbullab-22-squadron.name: Belbullab-22 Starfighter Squadron
general-grievous-belbullab-22-squadron.ability: While attacking a ship or squadron with no readied defense tokens, each of your Crit adds 1 damage to the total.

phlac-arphocc-droid-tri-fighter-squadron.author: Atomic Mass Games
phlac-arphocc-droid-tri-fighter-squadron.name: Droid Tri-Fighter Squadron
phlac-arphocc-droid-tri-fighter-squadron.ability: After an enemy squadron ends its activation at distance 1, that squadron suffers 1 damage.

jango-fett-slave-i-errata.author: Atomic Mass Games
jango-fett-slave-i-errata.name: Slave I
jango-fett-slave-i-errata.ability: While attacking a unique squadron during your activation, you may deal 1 damage to another friendly squadron at distance 1 of the defender. If you do, you may change 1 die to any face.

baktoid-hyena-droid-bomber-squadron.author: Fantasy Flight Games
baktoid-hyena-droid-bomber-squadron.name: Hyena-class Droid Bomber Squadron
baktoid-hyena-droid-bomber-squadron.ability: While attacking a ship, if another friendly squadron with bomber is at distance 1 of the defender, you may change 1 die to a face with a Accuracy icon.

dbs-404-hyena-droid-bomber-squadron.author: Fantasy Flight Games
dbs-404-hyena-droid-bomber-squadron.name: Hyena-class Droid Bomber Squadron
dbs-404-hyena-droid-bomber-squadron.ability: While attacking, if you are touching the defender, you may suffer 1 damage to add 1 die to your attack pool of a color that is already in your attack pool.

haor-chall-vulture-droid-squadron.author: Fantasy Flight Games
haor-chall-vulture-droid-squadron.name: Vulture-class Droid Fighter Squadron
haor-chall-vulture-droid-squadron.ability: Before an enemy ship or squadron at distance 1 moves, you may perform an attack against that ship or squadron even if you are engaged.

dfs-311-vulture-droid-squadron.author: Atomic Mass Games
dfs-311-vulture-droid-squadron.name: Vulture-class Droid Fighter Squadron
dfs-311-vulture-droid-squadron.ability: While you are defending, if the attack is obstructed, you may force the attacker to reroll 1 die of your choice.

armed-station.author: Fantasy Flight Games
armed-station.release: Rebellion in the Rim Campaign Armada
armed-station.expansion: Rebellion in the Rim - Campaign Expansion (SWM31)
armed-station.name: Armed Station
armed-station.ability:
This station cannot suffer critical effects.
To determine line of sight to or from this station, trace to the point of its token that is closest to the squadron or hull zone that is attacking or defending.

unarmed-station.author: Fantasy Flight Games
unarmed-station.release: Rebellion in the Rim Campaign Armada
unarmed-station.expansion: Rebellion in the Rim - Campaign Expansion (SWM31)
unarmed-station.name: Unarmed Station
unarmed-station.ability:
This station cannot suffer critical effects.
To determine line of sight to or from this station, trace to the point of its token that is closest to the attacking squadron or hull zone.
